title: cyber attack mitigation
extract: Attack mitigation is a detection and protection strategy used to safeguard networks, servers and applications by IT administrators in order to minimize the effect of malicious traffic and intrusion attempts while maintaining functionality for users.
extract_html: Attack mitigation is a detection and protection strategy used to safeguard networks, servers and applications by IT administrators in order to minimize the effect of malicious traffic and intrusion attempts while maintaining functionality for users.
